channel.title: Haptics on J. Felipe Gonzalez, Ph.D.

item.title: Adaptic: A Shape Changing Prop with Haptic Retargeting
Facilitating Programming-based 3D Computer-Aided Design using Bidirectional Programming
item.description: Abstract 3D Computer-Aided Design (CAD) applications allow users to create visual representations of models, helping create, edit, test, and analyze designs. Most offer a Graphical User Interface (GUI) with direct manipulation providing easy-to-use interactions, while a less popular category adopts a programming-based approach requiring users to describe models using specific programming languages. Programming-based CAD applications provide multiple benefits to 3D design, but their use remains limited, potentially due to higher entry barriers and extensive programming requirements.
